column3:
ACK, compiles and runs nicely for me.

You should add hash.h to bitcoin-qt.pro, though.
Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/0fb9073edd49a39a64d7c7dbf6e6100a7259c0e1 for binaries and test log.\n
ACK, util.h has grown too large anyway\n

@laanwj Indeed; maybe I'll need to split off a few more things, but I think that's nice anyway (like moving the adjustedtime stuff to network, as it's quite insane that util depends on netbase now...).\n
